column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our waiter was super friendly and helpful. My friend got a Cotes du Rhone
column2: and I got a Kir Royale (my first ever and not my last!). After we ordered our entrees
column3: they came out in almost a break-neck speed. I think it's because we were there on the early side. My medium filet was perfectly cooked and flavorful. My friend's short rib stroganoff was indulgent and comforting
column4: as that dish should be. And the side of peppered
